params.poaId: The unique identifier of the submission

params.agentId: The agent ID to filter by

returns.agentSubmissions: Array of submission IDs from the specified agent

returns.filteredSubmissions: Array of submission IDs with the specified status

params._dvnConsensusContract: Address of the DVN consensus contract

params.agentId: The ID of the Worker Agent submitting work
params.metadataURI: IPFS hash containing the submission package
